trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMJIFARMSHOP_00787_Q1_100_000<tab>Y-You want to know what I do? But my name─I thought it was obv─ahem. Very well. What I do is quite simple: I take any of the materials you've collected on the island, and sell them for cowries on your behalf. Don't worry, I <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> take anything for myself. Trust me.
TEXT_CTSMJIFARMSHOP_00787_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>Sell materials in your isleventory to the enterprising exporter in exchange for islander's cowries.
TEXT_CTSMJIFARMSHOP_00787_SYSTEM_100_005<tab>In addition, the enterprising exporter may be willing to part with seafarer's cowries in exchange for uncommon materials in your isleventory.

TEXT_CTSMJIFARMSHOP_00787_Q1_200_000<tab>Why, hello there, friend of the owner! (Pssst, just between you and me, I might have a little something for you...if you've got the cowries.) <bleep> Oh, I didn't see you there, felicitous! Don't you worry, I'm just conversing with this lovely individual here. (Nosy cat bastard...)
